inclusion.criterion: Undergoing or underwent CABG with at least one saphenous vein graft
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Individuals unable to provide informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Non-cardiac illness with life expectancy <2 years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant arrhythmia; heart rate ≥ 100 beats/min; systolic blood pressure ≤90 mmHg
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to beta blockers or nitroglycerin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Canadian Cardiovascular Society class IV angina
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He reports occasional dizziness and HA, denies CP/SOB. Carotid U/S showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis.
